content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
The structure consists of two main parts:
1. A table-like structure with:
   - 4 orange cylindrical legs
   - A yellow rectangular top
   - A tall orange cylindrical column on top
   - A yellow semi-cylindrical cap at the very top

2. A separate ground pattern made of:
   - Orange triangular/wedge pieces
   - Blue rectangular pieces
   - One green square piece in the center

Block count and layers:
- Ground pattern: 7 blocks (1 layer)
- Table structure: 7 blocks (3 layers)
Total: 14 blocks

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 8 (orange cylinder - front left leg)
    Step2: Move block with index 8 (orange cylinder - front right leg)
    Step3: Move block with index 8 (orange cylinder - back left leg)
    Step4: Move block with index 8 (orange cylinder - back right leg)
    Step5: Move block with index 6 (yellow rectangular top)
    Step6: Move block with index 8 (orange cylinder - vertical column)
    Step7: Move block with index 10 (yellow semi-cylindrical cap)
    Step8: Move block with index 16 (orange triangle - left)
    Step9: Move block with index 16 (orange triangle - right)
    Step10: Move block with index 4 (blue rectangle - left)
    Step11: Move block with index 4 (blue rectangle - right)
    Step12: Move block with index 1 (green square - center)
    Step13: Move block with index 14 (orange thin piece - left)
    Step14: Move block with index 14 (orange thin piece - right)
}

The assembly order starts from the bottom up for the table structure, then creates the ground pattern from left to right.
